Html:
When I run optimize, I get a nice screen showing the difference between what I have equipped, and what the optimizer would like for me to equip.

I'd like to be able to get the same difference screen, showing the difference in equipped items between player1.xml and player2.xml.

For me, player1.xml and player2.xml might before and after DPS sets from Batch Optimize (which doesn't give me a difference screen like the regular Optimize does).

Another possibility is that player1.xml might be my regular DPS set, and player2.xml might be the "no heroic presence" set.  I typically give my in-game gear manager a full set for DPS, but just a list of differences for the "no heroic presence" set, since I've never seen it different in more than four slots.

I expected to see this kind of request in the discussion history, but I couldn't find one.
Definitely useful. I'll try to get it in for batch tools.
